entry.tran: 电车轨道;(有轨)电车线路
entry.def: A tramway is a set of rails laid in the surface of a road for trams to travel along.

means.word_mean: 1. a conveyance that transports passengers or freight in carriers suspended from cables and supported by a series of towers
2. the track on which trams or streetcars run
